dcterms:creator: Chirag Agarwal
Himabindu Lakkaraju
Marinka Zitnik
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created to manipulate the data generation process, including features, latent embeddings, graph structure, and labels based on a causal model.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset

dcterms:creator: Chirag Agarwal
Himabindu Lakkaraju
Marinka Zitnik
dcterms:description: This graph contains the data of defendants who got released on bail at the U.S state courts, where each node represents a defendant and edges represent their similarity of criminal records and demographics.
dcterms:title: Bail

dcterms:creator: Chirag Agarwal
Himabindu Lakkaraju
Marinka Zitnik
dcterms:description: This graph contains people's default payment information, where each node represents an individual and edges represent the similarity of their spending and payment patterns.
dcterms:title: Credit
